@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <ar>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=ar' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

favoriteDeleteDialog.title: Delete from favorites
favoriteDeleteDialog.content: Do you really want to delete from favorites "{name}"?
